Methodologies: Measurement of thrombin activity using thromboplastin-activated coagulation and electrochemical signal
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Roche Diagnostics CoaguChek Vantus System, a handheld analyzer with test strips for patient self-testing of INR/PT using capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: For self-testing by adults (22+), stabilized on vitamin K antagonist anticoagulation (6+ weeks), to monitor INR/PT from fresh capillary whole blood via fingerstick using CoaguChek XS PT test strips, under physician prescription.
